skins.selfIntroduction: I am Newcastle of the Southampton subclass of Town-class light cruisers. While my record is one of the longest, I also somehow had the most free time... It would be nice if I could make it to retirement safely this time as well.
skins.acquisition: I thought I had gotten lost, but how fortunate that I ran into you. I am the Town-class light cruiser, Newcastle. Thank you for looking after my sisters.
skins.login: Would you rather have a cup of coffee, a spot of tea, or a splash of pale ale before work?
skins.details: You'll have to get a bit closer if you want to share this umbrella.
skins.secretaryIdle1: While I may not have as many battle commendations as my younger sisters, I'm confident none of them know how to enjoy life quite like I do.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm no good at these cat and mouse games. Sigh... Why don't you just have a seat and we'll talk like normal people...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Everyone comes into this world with all kinds of hopes and dreams... But not everyone will lead a life full of adventure and surprises.
skins.secretaryTouch: It's like... a couple of small animals playing with each other. Hehe!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...You like my soft bits so much, do you? Now then, what if I were to give you a nice, soft, satisfying embrace?

skins.shipDescription: I've got an all new outfit here. Does it please you...? Hehe, seeing you all giddy like that is going to rub off on me as well.
skins.acquisition: I've got an all new outfit here. Does it please you...? Hehe, seeing you all giddy like that is going to rub off on me as well.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My quiet, peaceful life has been riled like these waves, and you need to take responsibility for that.
skins.secretaryIdle2: ...All your staring at me is quite a big hindrance to my work. If you have something you need from me, maybe you could wait until I'm finished?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Looking to the future has never been one of my skills... Do you think you could take care of this one for me?
skins.secretaryTouch: In the interests of fairness, I think I should be toying with you next time?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...Don't you think you'll regret it if you keep going?

skins.shipDescription: This outfit makes me stand out a bit too much... But, as long as it makes you happy, I'm just as pleased.
skins.acquisition: This outfit makes me stand out a bit too much... But, as long as it makes you happy, I'm just as pleased.
skins.login: I've prepared a barley tea for you today. Now then, steel yourself, and give the day's work all you've got.
skins.details: There are always interesting things happening here at the port. I can feel my quiet, ordinary life slipping farther and farther away... Of course, that's not to say this lifestyle is all that bad.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Do we have time to call up my sisters to join us for some teppanyaki?
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's nice I can push all the maid work onto my sisters, but spending the whole day reading a book by myself is a tad dull...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've heard summertime is when you see a certain type of rose blooming... But I'm not sure if our port has that particular rose?
skins.secretaryTouch: It's what it is... But if you keep at this, my outfit is going to get ruined...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If it's the outfit you're interested in... Sigh... I suppose it's too late to stop you at this point?
